mapper.update: update fiction_chapter_extention set logic_code = #{logicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chapter_code = #{chapterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chapter_content = #{chapterContent,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cid, logic_code, chapter_code, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id, is_delete, chapter_content from fiction_chapter_extention where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
